channel.title: Comments on: New Google Groups Layout

item.title: By: JezUK
item.dc:creator: JezUK
item.description:
I think the new layout has good points and it's bad points.
Firstly, the bad points - it is VERY VERY difficult to see the structure of posts in a thread, and this makes it difficult to follow.
The good point about the new layout is that it is very much quicker than before, now it's a case of waiting seconds to see your own posts whereas before it was a case of hours or overnight.
I'm sure Google know what they are doing and it will improve re: the bad points.
item.content:encoded:
I think the new layout has good points and it’s bad points.

Firstly, the bad points – it is VERY VERY difficult to see the structure of posts in a thread, and this makes it difficult to follow.

The good point about the new layout is that it is very much quicker than before, now it’s a case of waiting seconds to see your own posts whereas before it was a case of hours or overnight.

I’m sure Google know what they are doing and it will improve re: the bad points.
